resources.string: Rocky Knob Homeowners Association\n Scaly Mountain, NC

A private, gated community located just off Hale Ridge Road in Scaly Mountain, NC on the \“Atlanta side\” of Highlands Plateau. Rocky Knob was originally created in the 1940\'s to be a fishing camp and then transformed into a beautiful residential area surrounded on three sides by national forest. The heart of Rocky Knob is the 17 acre Lake Osage, which is currently home to large mouth bass, bluegills, crappie and the occasional yellow perch and rainbow trout. Some sizable bass have been caught in the lake." "Several years ago the development was designated an Audubon Bird Sanctuary. Osprey, wood ducks, blue and green heron, owls, pileated woodpeckers, finch of all types, warblers, grosbeaks are just a few of the bird species found here."
